# Read-Only Incident Analysis Agents

Incident analysis often requires correlating
signals across logs, metrics, and alerts.

## Why Teams Consider AIOps Agents
- Faster synthesis of incident data
- Reduced cognitive load during outages
- Support for less-experienced responders

## Known Risks
- Gradual expansion of agent authority
- Over-trust in analytical output
- Blurring of analysis and action
- Silent acceptance of AI recommendations

This document provides context only.
It does not define acceptable agent boundaries.
